Name: Vortex Escape
About the game: Your ship is caught in a vortex, survive by moving the ship out of the coming obstacles and achieve the highest possible survival times. On the way you have a helper orb to assist you. Key features Elegant, minimalistic level design Challenging, fast paced and fun gameplay Randomly generated levels Single-player How to Play The Helper Orb is linked to the mouse pointer, this helps the player escape more easily by anticipating the ship's position.
